name: Match3attack
description:
Entry for LD41

There are still some small bugs however this is playable I would have liked to add more content and most of all more testing.

I am aware of some textual errors in the game as well.

Theme of the jam is " Combine 2 Incompatible Genres".

My version of that is combine a match3game with a war game.

Cost of units.

Barack - 30 bricks

  Tankshop - 40 bricks

  Soldier - 30 Money

  tank - 40 oil

Attack of units

  Soldier - 9 damage

  Tank- 18 damage

Automatically  made Turrets.

Standard Turrets  can withstand 2 attacks.

1 extra attack for each extra match.

Fix version 1.1 fixes some bug people experience making them not being able to finish the tutorial.
